ZenoEngineThe PHP Framework for Web Artisans... wait no, the Go Engine for Next-Gen Fullstack.

Lightning Fast. Laravel-Parity. Type-safe. Compile-once.

Get Started
Why Migrate from Laravel

Expressive, elegant syntax

Value elegance, maintainability, and clean code. ZenoEngine brings the Laravel developer experience to the performance of Go.

Blade Templating Engine

Familiar with @foreach, @if, and {{ }}? ZenoEngine features a 1-to-1 port of the Blade engine, rendering at compiled speeds.

ORM & Query Builder

A powerful Eloquent-inspired ORM. True eager loading, relationships, and fluent query chains without the N+1 problem.

Single Binary Deployment

Forget managing PHP-FPM, Nginx, and complex CI/CD. ZenoEngine compiles your entire fullstack app into a single native binary.
